articles.title: Lemon Slice nabs $10.5M from YC and Matrix to build out its digital avatar tech
articles.description: Digital avatar generation company Lemon Slice is working to add a video layer to AI chatbots with a new diffusion model that can create digital avatars from a single image.

articles.title: OpenAI is looking for a new Head of Preparedness
articles.description: OpenAI is looking to hire a new executive responsible for studying emerging AI-related risks in areas ranging from computer security to mental health.

articles.title: The year data centers went from backend to center stage
articles.description: Data centers are no longer the boring tech issue they once were.

articles.title: Waymo is testing Gemini as an in-car AI assistant in its robotaxis
articles.description: Waymo is testing a Gemini-powered in-car AI assistant, per findings from a 1,200-line system prompt. The assistant can answer general knowledge questions, control certain in-cabin features, and more.

articles.title: John Carreyrou and other authors bring new lawsuit against six major AI companies

articles.title: Amazons AI assistant Alexa+ now works with Angi, Expedia, Square, and Yelp
articles.description: The new integrations join other services like Yelp, Uber, OpenTable and others.

articles.title: OpenAI says AI browsers may always be vulnerable to prompt injection attacks
articles.description: OpenAI says prompt injections will always be a risk for AI browsers with agentic capabilities, like Atlas. But the firm is beefing up its cybersecurity with an "LLM-based automated attacker."

articles.title: Alphabet to buy Intersect Power to bypass energy grid bottlenecks
articles.description: Alphabet is set to pay $4.75 billion in cash, plus debt, for the data center and clean energy developer.

articles.title: ChatGPT launches a year-end review like Spotify Wrapped
articles.description: The experience includes awards, poems, and pictures referencing your year in chat.

articles.title: Splats app uses AI to turn your photos into coloring pages for kids
articles.description: The app turns your own photos into pages for your kids to color, via AI.

articles.title: India startup funding hits $11B in 2025 as investors grow more selective
articles.description: Startup funding rounds in India fell sharply in 2025 as investors concentrated capital into fewer companies.

articles.title: The European startup markets data doesnt match its energy — yet
articles.description: Europe's startup market hasn't produced meaningful numbers but there is reason to believe the data will start to change.

articles.title: Italy tells Meta to suspend its policy that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp
articles.description: Italy has ordered Meta to suspend its policy that bans companies from using WhatsApp's business tools to offer their own AI chatbots on the popular chat app.

articles.title: Can AI fix the operating room? This startup thinks so
articles.description: Theres plenty of hype around AI and robots in healthcare, but the problem thats actually costing hospitals money right now is operating room coordination.Two to four hours of OR time is lost every sin...

articles.title: Marissa Mayer’s new startup Dazzle raises $8M led by Forerunners Kirsten Green
articles.description: Mayer launched Dazzle after shuttering her photo and contact management startup Sunshine. Green’s investment suggests Dazzle is poised for the coming wave of new AI-infused consumer businesses.

articles.title: Nvidia to license AI chip challenger Groqs tech and hire its CEO
articles.description: With Groq on its side, Nvidia is poised to become even more dominant in chip manufacturing.
